resources.string: Camera permission is required to use this app.
You are on the latest version.
May your shot be better than your excuses.

string-array.name: insulting_warnings
string-array.item: Physics called. It wants your law degree back.
A fine example of geometric optimism.
Aiming is not a suggestion.
Even the chalk finds your methods dusty.
Let\'s list other things you could be doing instead. There\'s knitting, and…
Talent not detected.
Can\'t even scratch common sense.
There are no shots over there. I checked.
Do you need a bigger phone or a smaller table?
Your Mrs. called, she wants her title back.
\'A do not, this is,\' says Yoda.
Nope.
Not happening.
Won\'t work.
Try harder.
PLEASE try harder.
Try gooder?
Try... better. That\'s the one I was looking for. No, not your shot. The word I was looking for.
No.
Physics says no.
God says no.
Your mom says she\'s proud no matter what.
Your father says nothing.
Hey batter, batter…
In the beginning, God created a better shot.
Am I crying from laughing, or is this just sad?
Am I pretty, yet?
Do you even know how to pool, bro?
That\'s… an angle. Not a good one.
I can\'t be more disappointed than your dad.
Consult a physicist. Or a therapist.
Maybe if you put your phone down once in a while....
